vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.21;
son of: Hananiah (H2608L);
brother of: Pelatiah (H6410), Jeshaiah (H3470B), Arnan (H0770), Obadiah (H5662H) and Shecaniah (H7935)
§ Rephaiah = "healed of Jehovah"
1) a descendant of Zerubbabel and David
2) a Simeonite chief in the reign of Hezekiah
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar
4) son of Binea and a descendant of Saul
5) son of Hur and a ruler of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Zorobabel; tribu de Judá; (b)   hombre; tribu de Simeón; (c)   hijo de Tolá; tribu de Isacar; (d) רָפָה   hijo de Biná; tribu de Benjamín; (e)   hijo de Hur; jefe de la mitad del distrito de Jerusalén
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利法雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的先鋒"
1) 大衛的後裔 (代上 3:21)
2) 希西家時代,西緬支派的首領 (代上 4:42)
3) 以薩迦的孫子,陀拉的兒子 (代上 7:2)
4) 掃羅的後裔 (代上 9:43)
5) 尼希米時代,耶路撒冷的首領 (尼 3:9)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
利法雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的先锋"
1) 大卫的后裔 (代上 3:21)
2) 希西家时代,西缅支派的首领 (代上 4:42)
3) 以萨迦的孙子,陀拉的儿子 (代上 7:2)
4) 扫罗的后裔 (代上 9:43)
5) 尼希米时代,耶路撒冷的首领 (尼 3:9)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.42;
son of: Ishi (H3469I);
brother of: Pelatiah (H6410H), Neariah (H5294H) and Uzziel (H5816H)
§ Rephaiah = "healed of Jehovah"
1) a descendant of Zerubbabel and David
2) a Simeonite chief in the reign of Hezekiah
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar
4) son of Binea and a descendant of Saul
5) son of Hur and a ruler of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah

A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2;
son of: Tola (H8439);
brother of: Uzzi (H5813H), Jeriel (H3400), Jahmai (H3181), Ibsam (H3005) and Shemuel (H8050I)
§ Rephaiah = "healed of Jehovah"
1) a descendant of Zerubbabel and David
2) a Simeonite chief in the reign of Hezekiah
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar
4) son of Binea and a descendant of Saul
5) son of Hur and a ruler of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.9;
son of: Hur (H2354I)
§ Rephaiah = "healed of Jehovah"
1) a descendant of Zerubbabel and David
2) a Simeonite chief in the reign of Hezekiah
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar
4) son of Binea and a descendant of Saul
5) son of Hur and a ruler of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.37;
son of: Binea (H1150);
brother of: Eleasah (H0501H) and Azel (H0682A); also called Rephaiah at 1Ch.9.43;
Another name of ra.pah (רָפָא "Raphah" H7498)
§ Rephaiah = "healed of Jehovah"
1) a descendant of Zerubbabel and David
2) a Simeonite chief in the reign of Hezekiah
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar
4) son of Binea and a descendant of Saul
5) son of Hur and a ruler of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
